name: ugly sweater ornament
notes:
crochet a fun ugly sweater christmas ornament! a great addition to the tree and can also be used for present toppers and garlands.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

**materials:**

* dk weight yarn
* 2.5mm crochet hook
* fabric glue
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors

the finished item measure approximately 2” x 3.5” (5cm x 9cm). item size may vary depending on tension and materials used.


  [1]: https://www.stitchbyfay.com/ugly-sweater-ornament-crochet-pattern/
